languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, я не оправдываю ересь, я просто не верю... не хочу верить, что Теодора была к ней причастна. Что все хорошее, что она сделала, можно так легко перечеркнуть одним словом".
"Lord Captain, I'm not excusing heresy, I just don't believe... I don't want to believe Theodora would be involved in it. That all the good she did can be so easily crossed out with a single word."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, я не оправдываю ересь, я просто не верю... не хочу верить, что Теодора была к ней причастна. Что все хорошее, что она сделала, можно так легко перечеркнуть одним словом".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I'm not excusing heresy, I just don't believe... I don't want to believe Theodora would be involved in it. That all the good she did can be so easily crossed out with a single word."
"Lord Captain, I'm not excusing heresy, I just don't believe... I don't want to believe Theodora would be involved in it. That all the good she did can be so easily crossed out with a single word."
"Lord Captain, I'm not excusing heresy, I just don't believe... I don't want to believe Theodora would be involved in it. That all the good she did can be so easily crossed out with a single word."
"Lord Captain, I'm not excusing heresy, I just don't believe... I don't want to believe Theodora would be involved in it. That all the good she did can be so easily crossed out with a single word."

languages.text: “舰长大人，我并不是打算为异端邪说辩解。我只是不相信……我不想相信西奥多拉参与了这件事情。说得就好像只要简简单单地贴个标签，西奥多拉做过的所有好事就全都一笔勾销了一样。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'm not excusing heresy, I just don't believe... I don't want to believe Theodora would be involved in it. That all the good she did can be so easily crossed out with a single word."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我并不是打算为异端邪说辩解。我只是不相信……我不想相信西奥多拉参与了这件事情。说得就好像只要简简单单地贴个标签，西奥多拉做过的所有好事就全都一笔勾销了一样。”

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je ne cherche pas à justifier l'hérésie, mais... je refuse de croire que Théodora y soit mêlée. Qu'un simple mot puisse détruire tout le bien qu'elle a fait dans sa vie. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'm not excusing heresy, I just don't believe... I don't want to believe Theodora would be involved in it. That all the good she did can be so easily crossed out with a single word."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je ne cherche pas à justifier l'hérésie, mais... je refuse de croire que Théodora y soit mêlée. Qu'un simple mot puisse détruire tout le bien qu'elle a fait dans sa vie. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, no estoy excusando la herejía, es solo que no creo... no quiero creer que Theodora estuviera involucrada. Que todo el bien que hizo se puede tachar tan fácilmente con una sola palabra».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'm not excusing heresy, I just don't believe... I don't want to believe Theodora would be involved in it. That all the good she did can be so easily crossed out with a single word."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, no estoy excusando la herejía, es solo que no creo... no quiero creer que Theodora estuviera involucrada. Que todo el bien que hizo se puede tachar tan fácilmente con una sola palabra».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン様、あたいは異端を許すつもりはないけれど…シオドーラ様がそれに関与しているなんて信じたくないわ。今までに彼女がしてきたすべての善行が、たった一言で簡単に消し去られてしまうなんて」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'm not excusing heresy, I just don't believe... I don't want to believe Theodora would be involved in it. That all the good she did can be so easily crossed out with a single word."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、 私は異端を許すつもりはないけれど…シオドーラがそれに関与しているとは、思いたくない。彼女が今までにしてきたすべての善行が、たった一言で簡単に潰されてしまうなんて」
「ロード・キャプテン様、あたいは異端を許すつもりはないけれど…シオドーラ様がそれに関与しているなんて信じたくないわ。今までに彼女がしてきたすべての善行が、たった一言で簡単に消し去られてしまうなんて」

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich entschuldige keine Ketzerei, ich glaube nur nicht ... Ich will nicht glauben, dass Theodora etwas damit zu tun haben könnte. Dass sich all das Gute, was sie gewirkt hat, so leicht durch ein einziges Wort auslöschen lässt."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'm not excusing heresy, I just don't believe... I don't want to believe Theodora would be involved in it. That all the good she did can be so easily crossed out with a single word."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ich entschuldige keine Ketzerei, ich glaube nur nicht ... Ich will nicht glauben, dass Theodora etwas damit zu tun haben könnte. Dass sich all das Gute, was sie gewirkt hat, so leicht durch ein einziges Wort auslöschen lässt."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, kâfirliğe kılıf bulmaya çalışmıyorum. Yalnızca Theodora'nın bu işte parmağı olduğuna inanmıyorum... Yani inanmak istemiyorum. Yaptığı onca iyi şeyin bir kalemde silinip atılması, içime sinmiyor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'm not excusing heresy, I just don't believe... I don't want to believe Theodora would be involved in it. That all the good she did can be so easily crossed out with a single word."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, kâfirliğe kılıf bulmaya çalışmıyorum. Yalnızca Theodora'nın bu işte parmağı olduğuna inanmıyorum... Yani inanmak istemiyorum. Yaptığı onca iyi şeyin bir kalemde silinip atılması, içime sinmiyor."
